code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BasketBuilder(_ref){let{onResult}=_ref;const[lines,setLines]=useState([{name:'',qty:''}]);const addLine=()=>setLines(prev=>[...prev,{name:'',qty:''}]);const updateLine=(index,key,value)=>{const updated=[...lines];updated[index][key]=value;setLines(updated);};const optimize=()=>{axios.post('/api/basket/optimize',{items:lines.map(line=>({productName:line.name,quantity:parseFloat(line.qty)||0}))}).then(response=>onResult(response.data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[lines.map((line,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex space-x-2 mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"border p-1 flex-1",placeholder:"Product Name",value:line.name,onChange:e=>updateLine(i,'name',e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"border p-1 w-20",placeholder:"Qty",value:line.qty,onChange:e=>updateLine(i,'qty',e.target.value)})]},i)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addLine,className:"mr-2 px-3 py-1 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded",children:"+ Line"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:optimize,className:"px-3 py-1 bg-green-600 text-white rounded",children:"Optimize Basket"})]});}
